body.p: This section has information on the working on Batik, and on the features that are supported by the code in the Subversion repository that hasn't yet made it to a release.

dd.p: The branches page lists the branches of development that are in the Subversion repository and their purpose.
The SMIL animation page lists the level of support of animation in the anim branch.
Some features of SVG 1.2 Mobile and Full are supported in the trunk, and these are listed in the SVG 1.2 support section.
Finally, there is a description of Regard, the test infrastructure used to test Batik functionality and avoid regressions.
